full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Number: WS3841411278

### Request for Proposal (RFP) Title: EF937-230999 - Mechanical and Electrical Retrofit of the Canadian Meteorological Centre

#### Notice of Amendment to Tender Closing Date

Please be aware that the tender closing date for Submission ID WS3841411278 has been revised as per the updated procurement documents.

**Tender Closing Date:** Monday, June 6, 2023 at 14:00 hours, Eastern Daylight Time (ET)

#### Description of Requirement

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Mechanical and Electrical Retrofit of the Canadian Meteorological Centre in Dorval.

The selected bidder will be required to provide civil engineering and building construction management services as defined in the technical specifications. The contract will be awarded based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Key Details:**

* **Intent to Participate:** The RFP submission shall include all required supporting documentation.
* **Closing Requirements:** All bids must be submitted at the latest by 14:00 hours, ET on June 6, 2023. Submissions received after this time will be deemed non-responsive.

**Bidder/Proponent Information:**

* Contact Name: Zanoun, Fahad
* Contact Email: [fahad.zanoun@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:fahad.zanoun@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Additional Information:**

* Notice URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16081170?extsite=MTYwODExNzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16081170?extsite=MTYwODExNzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Procurement Category: CNST
* Trade Agreements: Various international trade agreements may apply. Please refer to the procurement documents for further details.

Please forward any expressions of interest to the contact note above. All questions, amendments and clarifications must be submitted prior to the tender closing date.
